entries.title_d: Your sensors have spotted Hortrix and he's making a break for it. Catch up to him and terminate him but be careful, he's a skilled and tricky pilot.
entries.title: Yavin system: Time to get paid.
entries.quest_target_d: Hortrix Steelarm is not a fighter pilot but he's an expert at avoiding enemies and he's got a few tricks up his sleeve so stay sharp!
entries.quest_location_d: This area of the Yavin system should be relatively safe from Imperial enemies and pirates but you got other enemies to worry about, your target is in your sights!
entries.failed_escape: You had him and you let him get away! That's it, come back when you know what you're doing.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Valarian Assassin Coordinator: < Alright, now claim your bounty, terminate Hortrix! >
entries.escort_remaining: Valarian Assassin Coordinator: < Good, but you better not let Hortrix escape! >
entries.autorewardsubject: Transfer of funds to your account.
entries.autorewardbody: Bank statement. Confirmation of fund transfer. Nairalav Shipping Co. transfered the sum of 10,000 credits to your bank account. Sincerely, Ovpi Urgon, Bank Manager, Mos Espa Valid.
entries.assassinate_success: Not bad, not bad at all. You should get an e-mail verifying the transfer of funds to your bank account in a few seconds. Pleasure doing business with you pilot.
entries.arrival_phase_2: He's trying to escape, but we've locked on to him. Your nav computer should have a waypoint now. Go get him!
entries.arrival_phase_1: There he is! Time to claim your bounty pilot! Don't let him get away!
